subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: Four former racehorses belonging to Ernie Paragallo, a prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner, were found in a kill pen suffering from extreme neglect.
snippet: Four former racehorses belonging to Ernie Paragallo, a prominent New York thoroughbred breeder and owner, were found in a kill pen suffering from extreme neglect.
